definition: to fall/to drop/to lag behind/to lose/to go missing/to reduce/fall (in prices)/to lose (value, weight etc)/to wag/to swing/to turn/to change/to exchange/to swap/to show off/to shed (hair)/(used after certain verbs to express completion, fulfillment, removal etc)
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The AutoDisabled flag is cleared when the system goes offline.
sentences.chinese: 自動禁用的標記將在系統掉線時清除。

sentences.english: Log the source address for ACL-related connection drops.
sentences.chinese: 日誌源地址爲前交叉韌帶有關的掉線。

sentences.english: In case of disconnections, the game must be restored right after the drop.
sentences.chinese: 所有比賽必須錄像，包括掉線的比賽。
一名特工答道，“阿爾梅達掉線了。”

sentences.english: Once the load starts increasing the performance starts dropping.
sentences.chinese: 一旦負載增大就可能會掉線。

sentences.english: AT&T has given Apple the call drop data.
sentences.chinese: AT&T已經向蘋果提交了通話掉線統計數字。

sentences.english: As Jobs sees it, that’s not a big rise in dropped calls.
sentences.chinese: 在喬布斯看來，通話掉線率並沒有很大地增加。

sentences.english: QQ is abrupt drop a line , remount is not ascended went up.
sentences.chinese: QQ忽然一下就掉線，再登就登不上去了。

definition: (of a mobile app) to crash on startup/to crash
to start the servers (for an online game, typically after the system has been shut down for maintenance, upgrade etc)
to hang up (a phone)/to leave a computer etc running (idling, downloading, or playing a game in one's stead etc)
lit. drinking poison in the hope of quenching one's thirst (idiom)/fig. a supposed remedy that only makes matters worse
to strip sb of their Party membership and government job (開除黨籍，開除公職|开除党籍，开除公职)
to respond to an assault by killing one's assailant
(of a guitar, kite etc) to have a string break/(of a tradition etc) to be discontinued/(telephone or Internet connection) disconnected/cut off
lit. to give medicine to a dead horse (idiom)/fig. to keep trying everything in a desperate situation
pinyin: si3 ma3 dang4 huo2 ma3 yi1
